column1: Kata Robata////Don't to-go from this place
column2: they don't place same quantity/quality compared to dining in. 6 pieces of thinly sliced salmon vs over 9 pieces that are thickly sliced. For this item that is highly priced
column3: one would expect to get what is paid for. If you want high quality sushi with thickly sliced pieces
column4: you guys might want to check out teppay on westheimer. All their pieces are thickly sliced
